effect.name: Shape Alpha
effect.description: Create an alpha channel (transparency) based on another resource
effect.author: Charles Yates

parameter.name: mix
Threshold
parameter.comment: Convert alpha or luma values below this level as opaque and above this level as transparent. This is mostly useful for luma wipe images.

parameter.name: softness
Softness
parameter.comment: When using mix (threshold) how soft to make the edge around the threshold. 0.0 = no softness, 1.0 = too soft.

parameter.name: invert
Invert
parameter.comment: Use the inverse of the alpha or luma value.

parameter.name: use_luminance
Use Luma
parameter.comment: Use the image luma instead of the alpha channel.

effect.parameter: Use Threshold Whether to apply a threshold filter to the luma or alpha or not. If not, luma or alpha value of the resource (File) is copied to the alpha channel.
